> <OLD>
>
> windlord nodded and followed Lord Elder

<NEW>

They quickly made their way to the bridge again, the trip short and
uneventful. As the doors opened LEGACY's tall and robust form could be
seen watching the main view screen.

On the screen was a close up view of NIGHTSHIFT attempting to get into
computer system and find out who hacked it.

LORD ELDER slid back into the command chair and activated the
communication system. "I see you trying to find the hacker." ELDER
said across the channel, "But if the hacker was able to steal someone
else's identity code, then all you would get is their stolen ID."

Of course ELDER was referring to the technician's code that was all
over the screen. It would seem that somehow the insect creaures had
gotten a technician's code and used it.

"No one has been there in weeks or longer." ELDER said. "I don't think
the insect creatures would have their own ID to get in with, they
would probably have to have stolen it somehow."

ELDER turned to WINDLORD, "Do you have any computer skills in this area?"

(TAG)

- Preston
